Name: Stonehide Reforged
Title: Forged From Rock
Desc: An enduring force flows through that craggy form.
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against Stonehide Lawachurl at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Stonehide Reforged
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2601]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2601] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S26013]</color> once.
When your $[A2601], who has this card equipped, defeats an opposing character: $[A2601] will re-attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126011]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126012]</color>.
(You must have $[A2601] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
